attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2010-1398

Date: 2010-11-09

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Claude Provencher, former Commissioner for Federal Judicial Affairs, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 6 ($165,400 - $194,700), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Audrey Elizabeth O'Brien, Clerk of the House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($186,300 - $219,200), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Marc Bosc, Deputy Clerk, House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($141,000 - $165,900), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Kevin Michael Vickers, Sergeant-at-Arms of the House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($141,000 - $165,900), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Robert R. Walsh, Law Clerk and Parliamentary Counsel, House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($141,000 - $165,900), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of William Robert Young, Parliamentary Librarian, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($141,000 - $165,900), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Gary William O'Brien, Clerk of the Senate and Clerk of the Parliaments, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($186,300 - $219,200), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Kevin S. MacLeod, Usher of the Black Rod, Senate, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 3 ($92,800 - $109,200), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Sheila-Marie Cook, Secretary to the Governor General, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($141,000 - $165,900), effective April 1, 2010.
